resources.string: What are the categories of zakatable wealth?

string-array.name: group1
string-array.item: All possessions can be classified into either zakatable or non-zakatable wealth. for the purpose of zakat calculation, Muslim scholars have established five categories of zakatable wealth: (a) Personal Zakatable Wealth: this includes money held in retirement and pension accounts. (b)Business Zakatable Wealth: 1.Trading goods and liquid assets including business inventory 2.Exploited assets such as rented properties and factories (c)Agricultural produce: 1.Crops from irrigated land,wherein the irriation system entails costs and labor 2.Crops from non-irrigated land watered by rain or natural spings

resources.string: What are the catagories of zakatable wealth?
